title: Cannot access smurf account, client says it was transferred to another region
body:
Hello I tried logging into my smurf or 2nd account after a 6 month hiatus from the game and the client told me my account was transferred to a different server. I didn't make this change and have access to the email on the account. I even tried going through each individual region with my username and password to see if someone compromised my account, but it isn't showing my account on any region. I submitted a ticket about this issue just a few minutes ago and would like someone to take a look at this please.
Thanks

replies.body: Heya, submitting a ticket was a good plan so our AR team can check this out for you and help!  If you have a ticket number, I'm glad to check on the status for you!
